# Imbalanced Resampling: SMOTE

```{r}
library(daltoolbox)
library(daltoolboxdp)

# assume `df` is your training data frame with target "Class"
model <- create_imb_smote_model(random_state = 42)
res    <- fit_imb_resample_smote(model, df, "Class")

X_resampled <- res[[1]]
y_resampled <- res[[2]]

dim(X_resampled)
table(y_resampled)
```
